price: 40. Et s’ils se détournent encore, sachez alors qu’Allah est votre Maître. Le Meilleur des maîtres et le Meilleur des soutiens !
arabic: وَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۚ نِعۡمَ ٱلۡمَوۡلَىٰ وَنِعۡمَ ٱلنَّصِيرُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-in tawallaw fa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha mawlākum niʿ'ma al-mawlā waniʿ'ma al-naṣīru
